name: Tsuru Pika Hagemaru: Mezase! Tsuru Seko no Akashi
overview: There are two parts to 'Tsuru Pika Hagemaru: Mezase! Tsuru Seko no Akashi' ("Little Baldy Hagemaru: Go For It! Proof of the Bald Cheapskate"); an adventure part and an action part. For the adventure portions, you will have to travel from location to location and talk to people. The action stages take place in-between adventuring sections. Traveling between the continents is done by seeing the travel agent.
